thumb.title: (VOCALOIDカバー) ハートシェイプドボックス（ミリアムのバージョン） - プロデュース：アイスラピス
thumb.description: Producer's notes and fun facts: Congratulations on your 21st anniversary, Miriam!!!!!!!!!!! It was a pleasure to work with you. I hope we will get a new, updated voice bank someday :3 This was originally planned to be an MMD video, but it could not be completed due to issues with motion capture dancers and time constraints. Tools and software used: MIRIAM (Vocaloid1) Audacity Microsoft Clipchamp Utaformatix
